data.title: Food, Language, and Identity in Singapore’s Hawker Centers
data.meta_description: In the nation of Singapore, eating has been described as a “national pastime,” and hawker food is often described as the true representation of the Singaporean identity. Unlike the itinerant street hawkers in the nation’s colonial and early...
